column3: Concept ACK. There another instance of `$(RES_IMAGES)` here:\n\nhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/d3a5dbfd1f18b89dd990ee83ece7c1dd9ba94b1a/src/Makefile.qt.include#L293
What about `$(RES_MOVIES)`? Are there really video clips included..
> What about `$(RES_MOVIES)`? Are there really video clips included..\n\nhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/1269cab21a9ac32f9ee8adfb9041950756eff3e4/src/Makefile.qt.include#L279
RES_ANIMATION would be a better name for the spinner, I guess
Renaming the directory would also help I guess: `$(srcdir)/qt/res/movies` What does 'res' even mean, resources? Maybe also use resources instead of res?

Created a PR here to rename movies to animation.

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19414

Movies has always seemed like an odd term for the spinner animation.
